data.message:
To all these alt-right Trump supporters spamming this thread, saying they're not Eminem fans anymore:
Slim Shady does not give a fuck.

replies.message: Damn right
By replying to his message they have just sucked his cock
He’s tired of your shit, and he’s going to kill you. Lmfao
Neither does Muhammad you hypocrite
All the same people probably know every lyric to Mosh as well
Imagine being this stupid. I know it's hard, but try.
Yes he will wen he plummets into obscurity nrlol
shady is gonna sell regardless cuz hes too damn real and is not afraid to call out shit as he sees it
But he does give a fuck, that's why he's rapping about it...
Once a douchebag, always a douchebag..  He's moving below Vanila Ice..  lol..
Guess he sold his soul to George Soros. I see puppet strings all over him. Or maybe he is like a jalapeno on a stick thats just Em on a Soros d!¢k
And neither does Eminem's fans Azad Aj.

If he doesn't give a fuck then he wouldn't be being a little snowflake butthurt little triggered pussy about Trump. Grow a pair. Sack the fuck up. Respect others opinions and beliefs. That is the most unamerican  thing you can do by not recognizing everyone has different beliefs
I'm a Democrat Women voted Trump  Eminem idiot

Not all Trump suppprters are alt righters or white supremacists. Liberals claim they hate labels, but are quick to label those that have different political views. 
Btw I'm a former democrat who voted Trump so I have seen the bullshit from both sides.
Slim shady sucks dick
Not alt rights you douche
Wendy Allen  this comment explains it all. Do you English?
Bertram Davis yea he's real 🤤🤤😤😤😤dumass
Alt right huh? What a dumbass.
He doesn't have to give a fuck ! We give a fuck and thats all that matters !!!✌🇺🇸 😉
Stuart Forbes
When his sales go down he'll give a fuck

i have always hated the little scum thug that beats females , tell you what ill go toe to toe with him and i will make him lick his own ass , toe to toe like a fucking man , i meet more woman  over sea's that have more  balls than that looser ... god bless trump and the usa! and you dont like it remember your free because of me and others like my hole family , that have bleed  for this country !!
